html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02802025-03-05FIN
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 14 (Nova Scotia)
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, No. 14 (NOVA SCOTIA) in order to (1) amend the provincial component of the tax rate of the HST for Nova Scotia from 10 percent to nine percent; and (2) add transitional rules for the implementation of the HST rate decrease and make any consequential amendments to reflect the new rate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0077 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, No. 14 (NOVA SCOTIA) in order to (1) amend the provincial component of the tax rate of the HST for Nova Scotia from 10 percent to nine percent; and (2) add transitional rules for the implementation of the HST rate decrease and make any consequential amendments to reflect the new rate.
